department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系
department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 法學緒論是引領同學入門法學的課程，課程中對於什麼是法律？法律的種類為何？法律的制定，立法程序如何？法律的解釋適用問題？以及現行憲法、行政法、民法、刑法與訴訟法制等，都有提綱挈領的介紹。除此之外，並輔以國家考試歷屆相關試題，提供同學準備公務人員考試的參考。
goal.en: "This class is an introductory course to law. It leads students to know such topics like what is law? What kinds of law? How the law enacted, the legislative procedure? How to interpret the law? As well as the current constitution law, administrative law, civil law, criminal law and legal proceedings. In addition, supported by previous questions of relevant national examinations, the course also provides students to prepare the public service exam in the future."
